ch.epfl.biop.atlas.aligner

Class MultiSlicePositioner

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.biop.atlas.aligner.MultiSlicePositioner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class MultiSlicePositioner
extends Object
implements Closeable
    All specific methods and fields dedicated to the multislice positioner There is: - a positioning mode This is mostly useful at the beginning of the registration Slices can be moved along the axis / stretched and shrunk Only certain sections of the atlas are shown to improve global overview, based on the user need - a review mode This is mostly useful for reviewing the quality of registration Only one slice is visible at a time The atlas is fully displayed

      Informations sent to the registration server (provided the user agrees)

        public void registerSelectedSlices(Command command,
                                   ch.epfl.biop.sourceandconverter.processor.SourcesProcessor preprocessFixed,

      • registerSelectedSlices

        public void registerSelectedSlices(Command command,
                                   ch.epfl.biop.sourceandconverter.processor.SourcesProcessor preprocessFixed,
                                   ch.epfl.biop.sourceandconverter.processor.SourcesProcessor preprocessMoving,
                                   Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Main function which triggers registration of the selected slices
        Parameters:
        command - the ui command
        preprocessFixed - how fixed sources need to be preprocessed before being registered
        preprocessMoving - how moving sources need to be preprocessed before being registered
        parameters - parameters used for the registration - all objects will be converted to String using the scijava ConvertService. They need to be strings to be serialized

      • registerSelectedSlices

        public void registerSelectedSlices(Class<? extends IABBARegistrationPlugin> registrationClass,
                                   ch.epfl.biop.sourceandconverter.processor.SourcesProcessor preprocessFixed,
                                   ch.epfl.biop.sourceandconverter.processor.SourcesProcessor preprocessMoving,
                                   Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Main function which triggers registration of the selected slices
        Parameters:
        registrationClass - the kind of registration which should be started
        preprocessFixed - how fixed sources need to be preprocessed before being registered
        preprocessMoving - how moving sources need to be preprocessed before being registered
        parameters - parameters used for the registration - all objects will be converted to String using the scijava ConvertService. They need to be strings to be serialized

      • registerSelectedSlices

        public void registerSelectedSlices(String registrationPluginName,
                                   ch.epfl.biop.sourceandconverter.processor.SourcesProcessor preprocessFixed,
                                   ch.epfl.biop.sourceandconverter.processor.SourcesProcessor preprocessMoving,
                                   Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Main function which triggers registration of the selected slices
        Parameters:
        registrationPluginName - name of the registration plugin - external
        preprocessFixed - how fixed sources need to be preprocessed before being registered
        preprocessMoving - how moving sources need to be preprocessed before being registered
        parameters - parameters used for the registration - all objects will be converted to String using the scijava ConvertService. They need to be strings to be serialized

      • registerSelectedSlices

        public void registerSelectedSlices(Supplier<? extends IABBARegistrationPlugin> registrationPluginSupplier,
                                   ch.epfl.biop.sourceandconverter.processor.SourcesProcessor preprocessFixed,
                                   ch.epfl.biop.sourceandconverter.processor.SourcesProcessor preprocessMoving,
                                   Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Main function which triggers registration of the selected slices
        Parameters:
        registrationPluginSupplier - a supplier of registration plugins
        preprocessFixed - how fixed sources need to be preprocessed before being registered
        preprocessMoving - how moving sources need to be preprocessed before being registered
        parameters - parameters used for the registration - all objects will be converted to String using the scijava ConvertService. They need to be strings to be serialized

      • addTask

        public void addTask()
        Simply indicates that a task is current being performed. This can be useful to indicate to the user that something is currently waited for or going on. You need to indicate when it has ended with removeTask() See getNumberOfTasks()

      • removeTask

        public void removeTask()
        Indicates that a task has been finished. See addTask() See getNumberOfTasks()
